title: Voting Advice Application settings
description: Settings for an OpenVAA-built voting advice application.

colors.description: The main DaisyUI colors used by the application. These have to be defined separately for both the light (default) and dark themes. Only some of the named colors are used in the application: e.g., 'warning' is also used for 'error'.

^primary|secondary|accent|neutral|base-1.description: The color value as a hex string or an rgb string

supportedLocales.description: A list of the locales supported by the application.

code.description: The ISO 639 locale code, e.g, 'en' or 'es-CO'.

name.description: The name of the language in the language itself, e.g. 'English' for locale 'en' or 'Suomi' for locale 'fi'.

isDefault.description: Whether the language is the default language for the application. Only mark one language as the default language for the application.

results.description: Settings related to the results view.

sections.description: Which entity types to show in the results view. There must be at least one.
